aka: Taxi Driver Gion Taro THE MOVIE - To All You Deserted Dudes
this_title: タクシードライバー祗園太郎 THE MOVIE すべての葛野郎に捧ぐ
trans_title: 出租车司机祗园太郎 大电影
Taxi Driver Gion Taro THE MOVIE - To All You Deserted Dudes
introduction: Taxi driver Gion Taro falls in love with one of his female passengers. When he learns that she is a famous actress shooting a film in his beloved hometown Kyoto, he doesn't hesitate for a second to apply for the last remaining acting role - as a taxi driver. Based on a radio drama, Gion Taro's odyssey is charmingly animated with paper cutout figures, set against the backdrop of scenic Kyoto.
chinese_title: 出租车司机祗园太郎 大电影
foreign_title: タクシードライバー祗園太郎 THE MOVIE すべての葛野郎に捧ぐ
